credit_line: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
title: Genius of Arts and Science
medium: Pen and gray ink, brush and gray wash
description: Horizontal rectangle. The Genius sits among a trophy of objects, referring to the Arts and Sciences. He carries a compass in his right hand and has his left hand at the shaft of a sphere. A laurel tree is behind him. Colored background. Dark brown framing line.
name: Drawing
